description:
Capable on road or off, the Aggressor Comp is ready for your local trails and your daily commute – especially if you like to take the long way home. The rugged aluminum frame feels nimble on the trails, while still being light enough to lift on and off of a bike rack. Grippy WTB tires, disc brakes, and a suspension fork make challenging terrain a little easier, and a lot more fun. And, with 3 rings up front and 7 out back, you get 21 speeds to help smooth out even the steepest climbs.

  • 6061T6 aluminum frame is light and strong
  • Triple triangle design uses floating seat stays to help smooth out the ride by absorbing road vibration
  • SR Suntour XCT coil shock has 80 millimeters of travel to smooth out rough trails and less than stellar bike paths
  • Small bikes are outfitted with 27.5in. Medium and Large bikes come equipped with 29in. wheels. By increasing the wheel size as the frame grows, GT believes they are providing the rider with the most efficient power delivery and ergonomics for their bike
  • Shimano Tourney and Acera 21-speed drivetrain delivers quick, precise shifts and takes the edge off of steep hills
  • 24-34-42T chain rings and 14-34T cassette offers plenty of mechanical advantage
  • Tektro mechanical disc brakes help you keep your speed exactly where you want it
  • WTB Ranger Comp tires use a low profile grippy tread for great traction on road and off
  • Mounting points on the frame for fenders and a rear rack
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: GT Aggressor Comp Bicycle - Unisex
